# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1039/org/openo/nfvo/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8483
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1039 > VERSION
